titles.title: HP384 Lord God, in whom all worlds

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord God, in whom all worlds,
All life, all work, began;
Give us the faith to know
We serve your master plan.
How happy they who thus have found
Contentment in the daily round.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
And if, in leaner years,
What we had gained is lost;
If progress must be bought
At someone else's cost:
Make us, one nation, swift to share
The hardship others have to bear.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
So for tomorrow's sake,
Teach us new skills today,
To do your perfect will
In our imperfect way,
And live as those whom you have called
To be your work-force in the world.
